Просто скажу так, донатная помойка из-за которой нельзя играть. Мало того, что игра платная, так в ней и очень много персонажей, на которых нужно донатить, ибо они очень сильные и против них невозможно противостоять. Ладно бы я понял, что можно купить их, играя долго и не попадаться с теми, у кого по 50-100 часов в одной игре, т.к. мы играем на 18-19 рангах, что даётся очень трудно.

good balance between killer adn survivor its totally possible to escape as 4 when you are playing with randoms or teammates in  red rang,i recommend to play as both sides so you learn  both perspectives
très bon jeu, néanmoins il y reste des bug mais qui sont corrigé rapidement.
Form your team and scream together.

They constantly rush updates out from their test server despite numerous bugs and a majority of their players complaining about the things they are trying to change and then act surprised when people get upset. The last update broke hit registration and desync so badly that the killer can hit you from 10m away constantly.
There's still something to fix but the gameplay is really funny (I suggest playing with friends).

This game has i think the worst and most toxic community i have ever seen in a game, both from in game and post game chat.

A lot of cheating is going on, its unbalanced (heavily survivor sided on most maps) and some killers are simply garbage compared to the others, resulting in an automatic loss before the game even started if you are against a decent team.

The devs seem to want to keep the players in the dark by not adding so you know who is premade with whom, even furthering spreading toxicity within the game since people get frustrated with this poor design.

At higher ranks you can expect quite long wait times to say the least as a survivor since, well if you have read this far then i am sure you can make a good guess at this point exactly to why.

The matchmaking is laughable at times, example: rank 1 is the highest rank and rank 20 is the lowest, it is not uncommon that a rank 9 or 10 killer gets matched against a full premade team of rank 1 - rank 4 survivors, the outcome of the match is already decided.

I used to like this game, but when i got up in the ranks it just turned sour, toxic and became a really shitty place, and i played survivor and killer.


To also demonstrate how "in touch" the devs are with the game, here is a video of one of them playing killer on a live stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R98e-Y4Lu8w

This dev had defended the buff to the flashlights and thought them to be fair and balanced.
After this stream they got reverted back fast, this is the people responsible for balancing this game and it took them being publicly humiliated for them to rectify their poor decision.

This explains perfectly why the game is what it is today since i am not sure they ever did went on public stream again after this.

edit: 

Now much later i have taken up the game again, and while there are some changes being made that is relatively large to be this game (Boon totems, Scourge hooks etc), the game still heavily suffers from devs that seem to be clueless in many regards of the game, and again brings the thought that these guys don´t play their own game.

The main issue right now that i have picked up on is the maps, where the problem is the sheer size of them that makes it impossible for most killers to assert pressure on the survivors, the ones with movement abilities fare better but still is under heavy pressure themselves. 

This forces the killer to try to tunnel someone out early or they will almost certainly lose (3+ escapes).

I play both survivor and killer, and this game is so ridiculously survivor sided still that it is not even funny.
For example, a very viable tactic as survivor is to simply start running a little bit before the killer arrives so you get some distance to begin with and then just hold W...
Do this and most of your team will escape on most maps.

edit 3: Just don´t buy it, it is just such an unbalanced mess it is ridiculous, and the developers keep making it worse by introducing perks that is bolstering an already broken "meta".
The meta is hold W a bit before the killer comes, then hold W in a straight line, and when you get hit you keep holding W. Eventually you might drop a pallet that the killer literally can not get across, and you guessed it: You keep holding W.

Do this and you will win by far most of your games.

This is the level the developers put the game at.

A new update:

Tried the game after a long time away, and of course there is entire areas of the map with zero hooks within walking distance at Midwitch...

I wonder why i punish myself since i know whese devs are terrible.

new edit: 28.06-22
The game is still trash with horrible map design, most killers are just weak and BHVR released a perk to "fix" the boon problem (It is conditional niche trash).

Just don´t get this game.

Jogo bem divertido, vale muito a pena. No início foi um pouco tenso até pegar o jeito da coisa, mas depois ficou ainda melhor. Com o tempo tende a ficar meio enjoativo eu acho, pois é basicamente fazer o mesmo toda partida, mas as mudanças de cenários e assassinos tornam a experiência mais intessante, assim como alternar se quer jogar como vítima ou assassino, o que acaba mudando completamente a jogabilidade. Os sons e trilha sonora variando conforme o assassino achei bem legal também.
Mejoren la calidad de los servidores del juego, duras mas esperando a unirte a una partida que jugandola por su atencion gracias

Love this game to death, lots of fun when it works. Unfortunately its plagued by errors to the point its unplayable. Trying to play with friends? Good luck half the time someone wont be in the lobby , finish a game rank update error you dont get to rank up. Player level update same thing. Finally sometimes its just [ an unknown error has occured] happens almost every time i try and find a match or finish one. Would love to see this fixed but so far after 3 months and many updates it still happens even more frequently than before.

"i think we did a pretty good job."

[h1] Dead by Daylight	[/h1]
[i] Feng Min is best waifu!	[/i]

[b] Pros:	[/b]
+ Developers are very active within the community.
+ Lots of progression and a rewarding level up system.
+ A ton of cosmetics to dress up your [strike] Barbie® [/strike] Survivor.
+ Multiple instances of tension. Quick decision making is required.
+ A numerous amount of perks to play around with to spice up your play style.
+ Survivor/Killer perks from DLC are accessible to those without DLC from the Shrine of Secrets.

[b] Cons:	[/b]
- Community constantly wines about both sides being unfair.
- The grind is horrendous, but if you're not aiming for every perk than it's not that bad.
- There are a fair amount of bugs/glitches in the game, but none are entirely game breaking.
- Dedicated servers are nice, but the hitbox and perk activation detection doesn't seem to line up with it.

[b] Overall Rating:	[/b]8/10
